text: Raianderson da Costa Morais (born 26 August 1995), commonly known as Careca (), is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Malaysian club Perak. ==Club career== ===Perak=== On 10 May 2019, Careca signed a contract with Malaysian club Perak. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Malaysia Category:Malaysia Super League players Category:Perak FA players
title: Careca (footballer, born 1995)
